name: boxcharter
description: An open-source web application that creates chord/lyric "box charts" for jamming. This is currently a work in progress; _eventually_ it will be deployed at http://boxcharter.com.
author: Bonnie Schulkin

scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.setup: npm run setup:client && npm run setup:server
scripts.setup:client: cd client && npm run setup && cd ..
scripts.setup:server: cd server && npm run setup && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
